
```{r, Chunk2}
ATFv2_2B <- read.table("OUT_ExSSs_ATFv2_Fig2B_mY_mY.txt", header = T)
ATFv2_2B <- ATFv2_2B[is.finite(rowSums(ATFv2_2B)),]
head(ATFv2_2B)
ATFv1_2B <- read.table("OUT_ExSSs_ATFv1_Fig2B_mY_mY.txt", header = T)
ATFv1_2B <- ATFv1_2B[is.finite(rowSums(ATFv1_2B)),]
head(ATFv1_2B)
```

```{r, Chunk3}
ATF_Fig2B <- ggplot(ATFv2_2B, aes(log10(mY), CoRa.mY.)) + geom_line(data = ATFv1_2B, aes(log10(mY), CoRa.mY., colour = "ATFv1"), size = 2.5, linetype = "solid") + geom_line(aes(colour = "ATFv2"), size = 2.5, linetype = "dashed") + xlab(expression(paste("Y synthesis rate (", mu[Y],")"))) + ylab(expression(paste("CoRa"[mu[Y]%in%theta], "("*mu[Y],")"))) + geom_vline(aes(colour = "mY(1)", xintercept = log10(0.3863)), size = 2) + geom_vline(aes(xintercept = log10(3.9), colour = "mY(2)"), size = 2) + geom_vline(aes(xintercept = log10(125), colour = "mY(3)"), size = 2) + scale_color_manual(name = "Legend", breaks = c("ATFv1", "ATFv2", "mY(1)", "mY(2)", "mY(3)"), values = c("ATFv1" = "pink", "ATFv2" = "purple", "mY(1)" = "grey25", "mY(2)" = "grey50", "mY(3)" = "grey75"))

ATF_Fig2B
```
